answers.answer: Hello,The first possibility for a frequent urination in females is urinary tract infection. Get your urine examination done and drink plemty of fluids. The second possibility is of pregnancy and if she is yet to get her periods then a urine for pregnancy test or blood pregnancy test need to be done.It can be due to many other reasons which can be physiological or disease-related, and include excessive intake of liquids, diuretic substances (including tea, caffeine, alcohol, certain drugs), anxiety, exposure to cold, diabetes mellitus, diabetes insipidus (central or nephrogenic), urinary tract infections or obstruction, etc to name a few more common ones. I suggest you to take opinion of your doctor who would do a clinical examination and advice for needful tests (such as routine urinanalysis, blood glucose test, blood & urinary osmolalities, ultrasonography of renal system, etc).I hope it helps. Take care and regards.

question: My girlfriend said she has been the urge to go the bathroom every 2-3 hours, she said that it has been going on since 2-3 days ago, she told mii that it doesn't burn when she urinates, but she has the urge to go to the bathroom by when she goes she only urinates a little bit, please help mii!!! And what does discomfort in the pelvi area mean?
title: Someone Please!!! I need help please!!! I need to know!!!!
